main.name: Victor Polisetty
main.description: I am a student at the University of Florida studying Computer Science and Economics. I am passionate about technology and machine learning and am extremely excited to leverage new ideas to advance our financial capabilities
main.bio: I'm a highly analytical and data-driven problem-solver who likes to find unconventional solutions using a bigger picture understanding. I love learning and believe in continuous improvement in everything I do. I think that there's always a way to do something better - and my life's goal is to find out how.
main.contactmessage: Want to reach out? Feel free to send me a message!

education.degree: B.S. in Computer Science (minor in economics)
education.description: Relevant Coursework: Programming 1 (Java), Programming 2 (C++), Data Structures, Discrete Structures, Programming Language Concepts

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Helped develop a WYSIWYG UI generation studio. Implemented feature to dynamically show, hide, enable or disable UI elements. Addressed production bugs and improvements using React and Go. Regular standups, sprints, retrospectives, and task estimation

work.title: Web Developer Intern
work.description: Built a website that featured three distinct web-based games using HTML and CSS. Lead designer responsible for optimizing the user flow of the website. Implemented a SHA-1 encrypted login page using MySQL and PHP

projects.title: Student Shop
projects.category: An iOS and Android app to facilitate buying and selling items between students on campus

projects.title: Swamp Explorer
projects.category: Maze game to help visualize the difference between BFS and Djikstra's algorithm
